response.overview: Sarat and Swetha are loving each other even though the elders of Sarat are not agreening and Sarat wedded Swetha duly rejecting the plea of his elders. Both are blessed with a Female Child. Sarat is working in Chit Funds and Investment Company. The boss of the Company has illegally made a plan to collect 50 crores deposit with Sarat and tried to put him in scam. Knowing prettly well that Sarat was cheated by the boss of the company he decided to commit suicide and told the same to his wife. Swetha did not agree his decision and told that if death is compulsory and having no other go as we decided to live together will go for death. Sarat said no but she did not listen. At last the baby was handed over to father and mother of Swetha and both consumed poision.
response.title: JAGAPATHI GARI MANAVARALU
